John Karlen (born John Adam Karlewicz; May 28, 1933 – January 22, 2020) was an American actor. He played multiple roles on the ABC serial "Dark Shadows" from 1966 to 1971.
In 1971 Karlen starred as the male lead in "Daughters of Darkness". He played Harvey Lacey, husband of Mary Beth Lacey, on the CBS crime series "Cagney & Lacey" (1982–88).
Karlen died from congestive heart failure in Burbank, California on January 22, 2020, at age 86.
